metadata.title: CVE-2025-1012 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A race during concurrent delazification could have led to a use-after-free.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 135, Firefox ESR < 115.20, Firefox ESR< 128.7, Thunderbird < 128.7, and Thunderbird < 135.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
